main event: A civilian reported observing a bright object in the sky from his home in Burnside, Kentucky, on June 16, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to be hovering and discharged flashing light in a repeating pattern.,Witness observed lights resembling automobile headlights that changed in brightness and color.,The lights seemed to ascend slowly before gaining tremendous speed upwards.,The witness described the lights as being about 200 yards east of his house.,The report mentions that several other similar lights ascended in the same manner.
sighted object: a bright, hovering object emitting flashing lights
witness description: Civilian observer who was at home with family during the incident
